name: Ancient Artefacts in Egypt
description:
Hello this was made in 48 hours. It is a bit sloppy, since i'm a noob in game making and this is my first time competing in ludum dare. Any way hope you enjoy.

Move : a and d or left arrow and right arrow

Jump : space

Complete all the levels and find out the secret. Of how you get in that bad situation!

Sorry that there is no linux build. I don't have a lot of internet so yeah!
